trans-unit.source: Sets the visibility of the content element with respect to the denial or acceptance of cookies or part of them

Sets the evaluation type:
  • show if ALL conditions: makes the content element visible if all below conditions are verified: mandatory, statistics and marketing
  • show if AT LEAST ONE condition: makes the content element visible if at least one of below conditions is verified: mandatory, statistics or marketing

Mandatory cookies condition:
  • any value: always true
  • denied: true if mandatory cookies are denied
  • accepted: true if mandatory cookies are accepted

Statistics cookies condition:
  • any value: always true
  • denied: true if statistics cookies are denied
  • accepted: true if statistics cookies are accepted

Marketing cookies condition:
  • any value: always true
  • denied: true if marketing cookies are denied
  • accepted: true if marketing cookies are accepted
